channel.title: Another model problem
channel.description:
Hey, I have recently added a cape that I recolored and made some slight changes on. It goes in game correctly, everything is fine. but, when I wear it, it is invisible/transparent from certain angles, and completely invisible from the back. You can only see it from the front. I'm not sure if this is an uncommon problem or I am just an idiot. But, I believe it may have something to do with setting my 'priorities' when I look at it in Datmaker. I will post pictures of it in Datmaker and in game when I get around to it.
Thanks a lot. ~~ 14-08

item.title: Another model problem
item.dc:creator: @blk_joe12 blk joe12
item.description:
@blk_joe12 wrote:

no problem

Read full topic

item.title: Another model problem
item.description:
@14-08 wrote:

Listen to ACF, he's 100% correct, ignore everyone elses posted because there's no way to 100% properly animate capes through datmaker, the only way is using "amulet" but that still makes part of the cape invisible.

Apparently not, all I had to do is set my priorities to 10 instead of 0. Like blk joe12 said, and the cape is not half transparent anymore ^^

It looks fine in game besides the fact that it is not animated at all. But, it is not transparent anymore.

Thanks a lot guys.

Read full topic
